mapper.insert: INSERT INTO process_instance (tenantid, id, name, containerId, rootProcessInstanceId, callerId, tokenCount, processDefinitionId, description, startDate, startedBy, endDate, stateId, stateCategory, lastUpdate, migration_plan) VALUES (#{tenantid}, #{entity.id}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.containerId}, #{entity.rootProcessInstanceId}, #{entity.callerId}, #{entity.tokenCount}, #{entity.processDefinitionId}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.startDate}, #{entity.startedBy}, #{entity.endDate}, #{entity.stateId}, #{entity.stateCategory}, #{entity.lastUpdate}, #{entity.migrationPlanId})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) FROM process_instance p, flownode_instance f, arch_flownode_instance af WHERE p.tenantid = #{tenantid} AND f.tenantid = p.tenantid AND af.tenantid = p.tenantid AND p.stateId != 6 AND ( ( f.logicalGroup2 = p.id AND f.assigneeId = #{userId} ) OR ( af.logicalGroup2 = p.id AND af.assigneeId = #{userId} ) OR ( f.logicalGroup2 = p.id AND f.stateId = 4 AND f.actorId IN ( SELECT actor.id FROM actor actor, actormember actormember WHERE actor.tenantid = p.tenantid AND actormember.tenantid = actor.tenantid AND actor.id = actormember.actorId AND ( actormember.userId = #{userId} OR actormember.id IN ( SELECT actormember.id FROM actormember am, user_membership um WHERE am.tenantid = p.tenantid AND am.tenantid = um.tenantid AND um.userId = #{userId} AND ( (am.groupId = um.groupId AND am.roleId <= 0) OR (am.roleId = um.roleId AND am.groupId <= 0) OR (am.groupId = um.groupId AND am.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) ) ) )
AND ${filter}
